query:
SELECT 
  u.email,
  COUNT(*) as total_questions,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'correct' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as correct_first_attempt,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect_first_attempt,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered
FROM question_progress qp
JOIN users u ON qp.userId = u.id
JOIN questions q ON qp.questionId = q.id
WHERE u.email = 'testyou@me.com' AND q.courseId = 30002
GROUP BY u.email;

  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as incorrect_first_attempt,
  SUM(CASE WHEN qp.firstAttemptStatus = 'unanswered' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as unanswered
FROM question_progress qp
